scripts.test: astro build && node -e "const fs=require('node:fs'); const path=require('node:path'); const candidates=['dist/blog/2025/mcp-servers-for-devops/index.html','dist/blog/2025/10x-engineer/index.html']; const existing=candidates.map(p=>path.resolve(p)).find(p=>fs.existsSync(p)); if(!existing) { console.error('No built blog HTML found.
